summary: An email from 'MIMMIE' to 'S, alMin' with a Cc to 'a se' dated June 24, 2020, attaching several talking points documents, including one titled 'Jeffrey_Epstein_Co-Conspirators_Talking_Points.v3.docx'. The email indicates the sender has shortened the talking points to a page or less as requested.

keyFacts: An email dated June 24, 2020, references an attached document titled 'Jeffrey_Epstein_Co-Conspirators_Talking_Points.v3.docx'.
The email indicates the sender has shortened various talking points to a page or less as requested.
Other attached talking points documents reference topics including 'Global_Energy_Producers', 'AOC_Investigation', 'The_Presidential_Coalition', and 'NRA'.
The document suggests the existence of prepared talking points regarding Jeffrey Epstein's co-conspirators as of mid-2020.
